name: Curiosity (Bodaciouslycrazy)
description:
While exploring Mars, a wild dust storm forces you underground to shelter. But as the storm forces you to dig deeper and deeper, are you prepared for what you will find?

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • E to pickup tools
  • MOUSE WHEEL to switch tool slots
  • LEFT CLICK to use your tool

Ludum Dare 48 submission from Wolf Pack:

Programming by Bodie Malik and Taben Malik

Art by Jacob Ostrander
